titleStmt.title: Lawes and ordinances militarie sett downe and established by the right excellente Robert Earle of Leycester ... ; to be obserued by all suche as shall serue in Her Maiest. Armie vnder him in the saide countries.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Leicester, Robert Dudley, Earl of, 1532?-1588.
